article.title: Ragged Dick
article.p:
Ragged Dick
, children’s book by
Horatio Alger, Jr.
, published serially in 1867 and in book form in 1868. Alternately titled
Street Life in New York with the Bootblacks
, the popular though formulaic story chronicles the successful rise of the title character from rags to respectability. Like most of Alger’s novels,
Ragged Dick
served a second purpose as a guide to proper behaviour for city youth.
